TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content:
We should all order 1 pizza at our local Dominos, make a Mass Relay, and fire it to SQUAD's office!

check the local pizza hut website?
